articles.author: By Sana Noor Haq and Hafsa Khalil, CNN
articles.title: Live updates: Russia's war in Ukraine
articles.description: Ukraine's military reports widespread fighting in the country, while leaders hope to speed up grain imports through reopened Danube River routes amid Russia's blockade of key Black Sea ports. Follow here for live updates.

articles.author: Amir Vera and Eric Levenson, CNN
articles.title: The fall of the prominent Murdaugh family: A timeline of deaths, alleged embezzlement and an insurance scam
articles.description: For 87 years, the Murdaugh family name came to represent a legal dynasty in coastal South Carolina. But now, the family has been closely connected to a bloody tragedy, allegations of embezzlement and a bizarre murder-for-hire plot to score millions in life in…

articles.title: Video: Report-author reveals most compelling evidence against Trump's election lies - CNN Video
articles.description: Conservative former Federal Judge Thomas Griffith, one of the authors of the report dismissing Trump's election lies, tells CNN's Erin Burnett what he found to be the most compelling evidence disproving Trump's claims.

articles.author: Brian Rokus and Veronica Stracqualursi, CNN
articles.title: Prominent conservatives issue report rebutting Trump election claims
articles.description: A group of conservatives, including prominent lawyers and retired federal judges, issued a 72-page report on Thursday categorically rebutting each of the claims made in court by former President Donald Trump and his supporters over the 2020 election results.
